column5: Cast - in in place with correct set out?
Brackets in position, check T bolts are used and nuts tightened, Note non conforming items and no changes made?
Smoke seal insulation installed & smoke flashing installed and sealed, bottom sills installed?
Panel installed and fixed in position?
Protection tape in good condition? No defects, scratches, dents distortion or cracks?
Work Complete, Acceptable & Functioning as per Specification
